title: Spectral Witness
description: "I could drown her. It would be easy." On a hot August day in 1985 a young mind on fire would try to put out the flames using the cold waters of Glass Lake. Those dark waters nearly killed Alexandria as a child but the remote high mountain lake fills her art, her heart and her soul. Because of him: Nate. Now, he is calling her home again, and, at this lowest point of her life, she will return. Glass Lake, with Nate's family home, historic Hallstrom House, has been called the most beautiful place on Earth. But, for Alex and her daughter Rose, it will become the most dangerous. Glass Lake and Hallstrom House have been the scene of many tragedies, some accidental, some most certainly not. Alex must protect her daughter when tragedy strikes again. That night in Glass Lake nearly kills Alex and, near death, she leaves her body. Now she finds herself a witness to murder. But one that could never testify in court. For Alex has become the spectral witness.Finding out who was behind the killing will take Alex across the most dangerous terrain of all: her own soul.
author: Diane L. Randle
